overview:
Carlos Moro, 33. CIT, Software and Integration Architectures expert, with ample experience on computing science, coding, networking technologies and security.

Carlos complements these capabilities, based on his professional experience in big corporations such as IBMGlobal Services and Panda Security, with a strong high performance teams management and strategy component.

His international experience is also hardened by his teaching and presentation background as invited professor in Deusto University postgrads courses, having worked for 2 years as architecture and platform responsible within a multinational team in a live, integrated platform for clients at the IBM Global Services Demo Center (London, Heathrow).
